casebody.data:
176 A.3d 224 STATE OF NEW JERSEY, PLAINTIFF-RESPONDENT, v. LUIS A. PEREZ, DEFENDANT-PETITIONER.

C-380 September Term 2017

079826 December 8, 2017

ON PETITION FOR CERTIFICATION

To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-005274-15 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is granted and the matter is summarily remanded to the trial court for a post-conviction relief hearing. Jurisdiction is not retained.
